billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

title: Enacts "economic development program evaluation act"; directs state agencies to conduct annual comprehensive evaluation of economic development activities
summary: Enacts the economic development program evaluation act and prescribes the functions and purposes of the special evaluation program bond act; requires state agencies involved in economic development activities to prepare an annual comprehensive evaluation of their programs; repeals "implementation of the jobs for the new New York bond act" which is to prepare a plan for each economic development program.
currentCommittee: COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
